title.rendered: UBank Hires Jordan Pedigo as Chief Financial Officer

content.rendered:
Chartwell Partners congratulates our placement Jordan Pedigo on his new role as Chief Financial Officer of UBank. As CFO, Pedigo
will serve as a senior member of the management team and a key contributor to the overall strategic direction and day-to-day
management of the business from both a financial and operational perspective. Pedigo joins UBank from BOK Financial Corporation,
where he most recently served as Vice President and Senior Division Controller.

“Jordan will bring an immense amount of value to the UBank organization as it scales, broadens, and evolves. Jordan’s mix of
experience in reporting and financial analysis within growing bank verticals will be very impactful for UBank in this next chapter.” said
Sean O’Neal, Principal in Chartwell Partners’ Financial Services Practice.

About UBank
UBank is a growing, Texas-based community-oriented bank that builds strong working relationships with each and every customer.
UBank believes that people bank with people, not a bank. Since their founding in 1961, UBank’s first priority has always been to serve
their community in any way they can. While UBank’s community has historically been the East Texas market, they are in an
unprecedented phase of growth that has given them the opportunity to expand their reach into new markets in Texas and the
southeast.

About Chartwell Partners
Chartwell Partners is a national, retained search firm founded in 2005 specializing in executive and board of director leadership
recruitment. Partner Scott Petty and his team pride themselves on being one of the best executive search firm recruiting teams in the
nation. We are regularly called upon by clients in the Commercial Banking, Community Banking and Mortgage Sectors to recruit CSuite and other senior executives. As a top executive search firm, it is our job and privilege to meet the executive recruiting needs of
our clients.
